keys: the euro area symbol currency representation
a respresentação euro da moeda corrente do símbolo da área

la rappresentazione di valuta di simbolo di zona di 
euro
η αντιπροσώπευση νομίσματος συμβόλων περιοχής του ευρώ

la representación de la modernidad del símbolo del área del 
euro

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>16102</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Symbols of the Euro</string>
            <string language="fr">Les symboles de l'Euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symbole des Euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Símbolos do euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simboli dell'Euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύμβολα του ευρώ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Símbolos del Euro</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A small game to learn the symbols from our euros and our national or European culture.</string>
            <string language="fr">Un petit jeu pour apprendre les symboles de nos euros et notre culture nationale ou européenne.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">the euro area symbol currency representation</string>
            <string language="fr">zone euro symbole monnaie représentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein kleines Spiel, zum der Symbole von unseren 
Euro und von unserer nationalen oder europäischen Kultur zu
erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo pequeno para aprender os símbolos de 
nossos euros e de nossa cultura nacional ou européia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un piccolo gioco per imparare i simboli dai nostri
euro e dalla nostra coltura nazionale o europea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μικρό παιχνίδι για να μάθει τα σύμβολα από τα 
ευρώ μας και τον εθνικό ή ευρωπαϊκό πολιτισμό μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un juego pequeño para aprender los símbolos de 
nuestros euros y de nuestra cultura nacional o europea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Eurobereich Symbol-Währungdarstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a respresentação euro da moeda corrente do símbolo da área</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la rappresentazione di valuta di simbolo di zona di 
euro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η αντιπροσώπευση νομίσματος συμβόλων περιοχής του ευρώ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la representación de la modernidad del símbolo del área del 
euro</string>
          </keyword>
